tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui

Class Label

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.Label
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CDrawable

    public class Label
extends Object
implements CDrawable
    A custom label using skatolo's BitFonts or PFont based ControlFonts.
    See Also:
    skatolo.ControlFont
